forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
